tool_description: Monitors camera health status including connectivity, hardware diagnostics, and performance metrics.

camera_ids.description: List of camera IDs to monitor

check_interval_minutes.description: How often to check camera health (5-60 minutes)

error_messages: Empty camera list: At least one camera_id must be provided for monitoring.
Invalid check interval: Check interval must be between 5 and 60 minutes.
Camera not found: One or more specified cameras do not exist in the system.
usage: Provide an array of camera_ids to monitor their health status. Optionally set the check interval frequency.

cameras_with_issues.description: Number of cameras reporting hardware or performance issues

last_check_time.description: Timestamp of the last health check
